archimate:Capability.name: Scope 2 Indirect Emission - Market Based
archimate:Capability.documentation:
Scope 2 are emissions that a company causes indirectly and come from where the energy it purchases and uses is produced. For example, the emissions caused when generating the electricity that we use in our buildings would fall into this category.
The market-based method calculates the emissions from the electricity you and your company purchase. The market-based method is intended to support the use and reporting of green energy tariffs via Renewable Energy Certificates (REC) and Guarantees of Origin (GOO).
